clues.text: You'll find the island of Madagascar in this ocean

rounds.comments: (Alex: We will give each one's meaning as a prefix and also as a separate word.)

clues.text: "Toward"; or, one point up in a tennis game
"After"; or, to station, as a sentry
"One"; or, the pre-1958 way to listen to recorded music
"Different"; or, someone who's not gay
"Against"; specifically, one fighting against Nicaragua's Sandinistas

rounds.text: For decades Rolls-Royce also owned this luxury brand named for its founder; now both are produced by German companies
